trans-unit.source: Supports the page parser in building controls that are connected to a data provider.
trans-unit.target: 支援頁面剖析器建置連接到資料提供者的控制項。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceControlBuilder> class extends <xref:System.Web.UI.ControlBuilder> by overriding the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceControlBuilder.AllowWhitespaceLiterals%2A> method to return `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceControlBuilder>類別會擴充<xref:System.Web.UI.ControlBuilder>藉由覆寫<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceControlBuilder.AllowWhitespaceLiterals%2A>方法以傳回`false`。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceControlBuilder> ensures that white-space literals are trimmed from the content.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceControlBuilder> 確保內容，會修剪空白字元常值。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataSourceControlBuilder" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataSourceControlBuilder" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether white-space literals are permitted in the content between a control's opening and closing tags.
trans-unit.target: 判斷控制項的開頭標記和結尾標記之間的內容，是否允許泛空白字元 (White Space) 常值 (Literal)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceControlBuilder.AllowWhitespaceLiterals%2A> method is used to determine whether white-space literals are permitted in the content between the opening and closing tags of a control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceControlBuilder.AllowWhitespaceLiterals%2A>方法用來判斷是否允許空白字元常值開頭和結尾標記的控制項之間的內容。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceControlBuilder> always returns `false` in this method, which means the white-space literals are trimmed from the content before the content is processed by the page parser.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceControlBuilder> 一律傳回`false`在此方法中，這表示泛空白字元常值會刪減內容才能處理網頁剖析器內容。
